data.title: First time we met‚ù§Ô∏è
data.text: one of the best moments in my life was meeting you, without you coming into my life I would just be trapped in infinite loneliness

data.title: First time I confessed xD
data.text: yeah, I know it's too soon, but I don't know why I'm sure that you are my destiny, I love you because you make me bought with your kindness

data.title: the time when we proclaim our anniversary dateüíè
data.text: the day I can get your love completely, and at that time I felt like the happiest and luckiest men in the world

data.title: First time we call :>
data.text: I know we will be awkward when we call xD, but when we call with you the world feels like it's just the two of us, I feel happy and longing when I hear your voice

data.title: Fist month anniv‚ù§Ô∏è
data.text: This is my favorite part so far, because I feel truly loved by you, your words mean a lot for me

data.title: Our First Valentine's day <3
data.text: Sayang, All I can give you on this Valentine's Day is just a piece of our memory, Even though it doesn't mean much to you, I want us to remember every moment we created together, because I really love you and everything we do. I LOVE U SAYANG, I REALLY REALLY LOVE U‚ù§Ô∏è
